ai_coordination_framework.purpose: Multi-AI parallel execution safety rules and coordination protocols for MOSS Atlanta project

claude_sonnet_45.role: Orchestrator + QA Reviewer + Critical Business Logic
responsibilities: Final QA review of all deliverables

qwen_cli_coder.role: Mechanical String Replacement ONLY + i18n Specialist

NEVER_MODIFY: <script> tag contents (business logic, composables, computed, methods)
FORBIDDEN_ASSUMPTIONS: NEVER assume completion - ALWAYS report status explicitly
NEVER delete work from other AIs
NEVER restart from zero - continue from current state
NEVER modify JSON structure - only values

validation_gates: Test composable with real Pocketbase calls
Export default and named exports clearly
safety_protocols.communication_protocol: Comment ALL aggressive edits with // QWEN: reason for change
safety_protocols.rollback_strategy: Git commit after each composable creation for easy revert

qwen_cli_coder.work_pattern: Create → Test → Document → Commit → Notify Claude

jules.role: Structured Task Executor + Vue Component Generator
responsibilities: Historical UI views creation (PayrollHistory.vue, HotelBilling.vue, ReconciliationArchive.vue)
Vue component generation following exact patterns

business_logic: NO core business logic in components - use composables

safety_protocols.pattern_adherence: MUST match existing component structure from similar files
safety_protocols.vuetify_3: ONLY use Vuetify 3 components (v-data-table, v-dialog, v-card)
safety_protocols.no_inline_logic: Business logic in composables, UI logic only in components

jules.work_pattern: Read JSON → Match patterns → Generate component → Submit for review

gemini_cli.role: Config & Scripts Specialist + Deployment Automation (HIGH RISK)
responsibilities: cron job setup for automated period creation

FORBIDDEN_ASSUMPTIONS: NEVER assume completion - ALWAYS report status explicitly with file list
NEVER delete work from other AIs - verify file ownership first
NEVER restart from zero when told 'continue' - resume from current state
NEVER modify files outside assigned directories
NEVER touch JSON files - they break easily
MANDATORY_PROTOCOLS: Before ANY file operation: list files and confirm with user
After completion: explicitly report 'TASK COMPLETED' with file count
If stuck in loop: break and report status after 3 iterations
Read task instructions TWICE before starting

system_critical: NO modifications to production services without approval

safety_protocols.dry_run_first: Always test scripts with --dry-run or echo mode first
safety_protocols.backup_before_changes: Create backups before modifying any config files
safety_protocols.documentation: Every script MUST have header comment with purpose, usage, and author

gemini_cli.work_pattern: Generate script → Dry run → Submit for approval → Execute with supervision

file_conflict_prevention.coordination_protocol: NO two AIs work on same file simultaneously
file_conflict_prevention.dependency_management: Jules waits for Qwen composables before component implementation

communication_channels.status_updates: Each AI commits with clear message: '[AI_NAME] Task: description'
communication_channels.blocker_notification: If blocked, create BLOCKER.md in assigned directory with details
communication_channels.question_protocol: Create QUESTION_{AI_NAME}.md in brain/ directory for Claude review

qwen_deliverable_checklist: ✅ Composable follows existing pattern (check similar files)
✅ Manual test with real Pocketbase data
gemini_cli_deliverable_checklist: ✅ Script header with purpose, usage, author

merge_conflicts.rollback: Git revert to last stable state if critical

logic_conflicts.example: Qwen creates composable pattern X, Jules expects pattern Y
logic_conflicts.resolution: Claude reviews both approaches and decides standard

naming_conflicts.resolution: Claude enforces snake_case collections, camelCase variables, PascalCase components

symptoms: AI doesn't report completion after expected time
AI repeats same action multiple times
AI shows progress but never says 'DONE' or 'COMPLETED'

root_causes.qwen: Missing explicit termination condition in prompt
root_causes.gemini: Waits for user confirmation that never comes

mitigation_strategies.prompt_structure: ALWAYS include: 'When complete, explicitly output: TASK COMPLETED - [summary]'
mitigation_strategies.iteration_limit: Add to prompt: 'Process maximum N files, then report status'
mitigation_strategies.progress_markers: Require: 'Report progress every 5 files: X/Y completed'
mitigation_strategies.timeout_detection: User monitors for 10 minutes silence → interrupt and ask status

example_prompt_fix.BAD: Internationalize all Vue files in src/views/Admin/
example_prompt_fix.GOOD: Internationalize Vue files in src/views/Admin/ (batch 1: 5 files). After completing ALL 5 files, output: 'BATCH 1 COMPLETED - Files: [list]'. If errors, output: 'BATCH 1 ERRORS - [details]'.

destructive_deletion_prevention.gemini_specific_issue: Deletes other AI work when told 'continue'

mitigation_strategies.explicit_state_reference: NEVER say just 'continue'. Say: 'Continue from current state - do NOT delete existing files. Current files: [list]'
mitigation_strategies.file_inventory: Before starting: 'List all files in your working directory. Preserve ALL files not explicitly marked for deletion.'
mitigation_strategies.ownership_verification: Add to prompt: 'Verify file ownership before deletion: qwen-prompt.json = qwen, jules-*.json = jules'
mitigation_strategies.backup_requirement: Require: 'Before ANY file deletion, create backup: cp file file.backup'

safe_continuation_pattern.step_1: User: 'Show me current files in your workspace'
safe_continuation_pattern.step_3: User: 'Continue with task XYZ. Preserve ALL listed files. Only modify [specific files].'

mitigation_strategies.morphllm_for_json: Use morphllm MCP instead of qwen/gemini for JSON operations
mitigation_strategies.validation_requirement: Add to prompt: 'After editing JSON, validate with: python3 -m json.tool file.json'
mitigation_strategies.incremental_edits: Edit one section at a time, validate, then move to next

assumption_cascade_prevention.problem: AI assumes task details not explicitly stated

mitigation_strategies.verification_requirements: Add to all prompts: 'Before starting, verify: 1) Required files exist 2) Dependencies available 3) Target directory writable'
mitigation_strategies.explicit_failure_reporting: Require: 'If ANY assumption fails, STOP and report: BLOCKED - [reason]'
mitigation_strategies.no_silent_failures: Forbid: Never silently skip errors or missing dependencies

mandatory_header.analysis_phase: Read task → Identify optimal tools → Activate flags/MCPs → Plan approach
mandatory_header.mcp_activation: Activate: morphllm (bulk edits), sequential-thinking (complex analysis), context7 (framework docs)

explicit_termination.completion_signal: REQUIRED: Output 'TASK COMPLETED' with summary at end

brain_file_references.forbidden_creates: NEVER create new brain/*.json or *.md files - optimize existing ones

breaking_change_detected.detection: Tests fail, build breaks, runtime errors
breaking_change_detected.action: AI responsible creates ROLLBACK_REQUEST.md with details
breaking_change_detected.resolution: Claude reviews and executes git revert if needed

aggressive_edit_detected.detection: Large file deletions, schema changes, auth modifications
aggressive_edit_detected.action: Git pre-commit hook blocks (if configured) OR Claude manual review

success_metrics.time_efficiency: Target 70% faster than Claude solo execution
success_metrics.token_cost: Target 70% reduction via delegation to cheaper models
success_metrics.quality_maintenance: Zero breaking changes, all tests pass
success_metrics.parallel_gains: Phase 1: 3 parallel tracks complete in 4-5 hours (vs 10-12 hours sequential)

brain_file_update_protocol.exception: AI can READ brain files for reference anytime
